// import library import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import $ from 'jquery' // import image function Login(props) { const ldr_animate_in = (e) => { const target_id = ('#' + e.currentTarget.id); if(target_id.indexOf('email') !== -1) { $('#login-email-icon').addClass('opacity-0'); } } const ldr_animate_out = (e) => { const target_id = ('#' + e.currentTarget.id); if(target_id.indexOf('email') !== -1) { $('#login-email-icon').addClass('opacity-100'); } } return (

SUNRISE CONTINENT

With this account, you can join in several websites powered by Sunrise Continent such as Sunrise Foods, Sunrise English and more.
DUONG MINH

LOGIN

ldr_animate_in(e)} />
ldr_animate_out(e)} />
); } export default Login;
